name: A geometric journey
description:
Objective: Explore the maze and find your way out.

Hint: Try to get the meaning of every message---the end of the game will test your understanding.

Controls: Arrows to move.

Credits:

A mini-game designed and developed by Yasmina & Eduardo during Mini Jam 52. All assets were made by us within 72 hours (with the exception of the wind sound).

Made with Godot, Aseprite, sfxr and beepbox.

Post-jam update: Added Linux, Windows and Mac versions.
